content:
# kebab-case name
# supports nested path
npm run generate ELEMENT ELEMENT_NAME

##
npm run generate component my-component
npm run generate view my-view
npm run generate service my-service

en.after:
With external templates feature enabled, generator-produced components and views include the __TEMPLATE_PLACEHOLDER__ token.
Builder uses this token to inject HTML templates into scripts.

fr.after:
Si les templates externes sont utilisés, les composants et vues générés incluent le token __TEMPLATE_PLACEHOLDER__.
Le builder utilise ce token pour injecter les templates HTML dans les scripts.
